text: 51 Pegasi b, also called Bellerephon, Dimidium or 51 Peg b, is the first extrasolar planet discovered orbiting a main-sequence star, 51 Pegasi. Michel Mayor and Didier Queloz announced the discovery on 6 October 1995. It is 50 light years away in the direction of the constellation Pegasus.Deborah Byrd and Eleanor Imster 2017. Today in science: 1st planet orbiting a sunlike star. SPACE October 6, 2017. ==References== Category:Exoplanets
title: 51 Pegasi b
